sections.heading: by publication.Service may be made by publication (1) when such service is elsewhere provided for by statute or (2) when ordered by the court

sections.text:
25-518.01.Service by publication.

Service may be made by publication (1) when such service is elsewhere provided for by statute or (2) when ordered by the court.

SourceLaws 1983, LB 447, ยง 34.
